entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • MAUI projects with an ampersand in the name can't be built or loaded #21090
  • ShellSearchHandler WindowManager$BadTokenException on Android #21088
  • `<Border>` on Windows when display with display set to scale 250% #21087
  • I need to create image and I need to put on top of it button and label any ideas? #21086
  • SearchBar crashes on iOS 17.4 #21085
  • Debug start doesn't run the app, getting some errors #21084
  • Enabling XamlC in Debug doesn't VisualDiangostics SourceInfo for Elements #21083
  • AOT + Trim - Could not resolve type with token 01000005 from typeref #21082
  • [Hot Reload] Hot reload currently fails if you have service scope validation enabled #21081
    .NET 8 SR4
  • [testing] Xharness fails to run locally #21080
  • [ci] Fix build failures report to Github #21078
  • [testing] TestTemplates RuniOS fails a lot on iOS #21077
    Backlog
  • The static `FontSize` values under `Windows` are illogical #21074
  • Impementation Error #21073
  • [Android] MediaPicker in Android 14 #21071
  • [Andriod] Symbol packages are not published #21070
  • [Android] IView (such as image) with inital Rotation has Incorrect offsets of PivotX and PivotY #21068

Closed

  • Maui Blazor fails to show messagebox in Release configuration on Android #9117
  • .NET MAUI Blazor Hybrid Windows platform: BlazorWebView component not shown when nested in VerticalStackLayout or StackLayout #8472
  • Unable to block popups in BlazorWebView #7930
  • [Blazor Hybrid] CSS Hot Reload changes get applied with a flicker on the UI #7905
  • Improve behavior for missing WebView2 Runtime on Blazor Hybrid Windows platforms #6575
  • BlazorWebView should support the "Fixed Distribution Mode" of the WebView2 runtime #2548
  • The preLaunchTask 'maui: Build' terminated with exit code 1 #21079
  • [ci] Enable APIScan #19396
    .NET 8 SR4
  • [net9.0] Fix Trimming issues on Windows #19430
    .NET 9 Planning
  • [ci] Fix net9 branch builds #20109
    .NET 9 Planning
  • No hot reaload #20334
  • Android Hardware Acceleration is Disabled in Maui? Cannot turn it on? Cause of Android performance issues? (Should be Enabled by default...) #21069
  • Mica material causes issues w/ UI tests #21021
    .NET 8 SR4
  • Android performance issues - unable to sustain 120 Hz updates for anything significant #20979

PullRequests

Created

  • [ios] fix memory leaks in `GestureRecognizers` #21089
    memory-leak 💦
  • [Trimming] Enable trimming and AOT analyzers in Core #21076
    area/app-size 🤏

Merged

  • [net9.0] Fix templates #21047
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/localization
  • [main] [net9.0] Fix templates #21055
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/templates 📄
  • [release/9.0.1xx-preview2] [net9.0] Fix maui query attribute support #21072
  • [net9.0] Fix maui query attribute support #21061
  • Bump editorconfig csharp_prefer_braces down to suggestion #21041
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Update repo documentation to reference Policy Service instead of FabricBot #21063
  • [Windows] Ensure consistent background colors for UI test cases #21022
    platform/windows 🪟, area/testing

Updated

  • [Trimming] Use type converters instead of implicit cast operators (part 1/2) #21050
    area/Xaml </>
  • [Android] Correctly scale Button image #19834
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • iOS PrefersHomeIndicatorAutoHidden - Implementation #20069
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area/platform
  • Throw error when pushing without wrapping into navigation page #20155
    area/navigation 🧭, community ✨
  • IndicatorView IndicatorTemplate Binding #19004
    area/collectionview 📃, community ✨, stale
  • Migrate iOS from NavigationRenderer to NavigationViewHandler #20759
    area/navigation 🧭, community ✨
  • [Trimming] Fix ILLink warnings in source generated code #21054
    area/Xaml </>
  • [iOS] Fix image button scaling #20953
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • [net9.0] [testing] Enable Windows UITests back #20727
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [WIP] Cleaning up CI iOS simulator issues #20817
    do-not-merge
  • Optimize performance of Flex.Item #20034
    area/layout 🔲, community ✨
